guidance.title: Set the stage
guidance.paragraph: We’ll take a quick snapshot of your context so Barhoum can shape your first touchpoint with intention. Share what feels true today—no perfect answers. The clearer you are, the more precisely we can prepare for you.

privacy: Your information is confidential and shared only with Barhoum’s office.

validation.phone: Please enter a valid phone number

thankYou.title: Thank you for reaching out
thankYou.body: Our office manager will contact you shortly to coordinate next steps. Keep an eye on your inbox and phone.

steps.title: Let’s get acquainted before we dive in
steps.helper: Give us a high-level snapshot of who you are and where you’re standing today. This sets the tone before we go deeper.

fields.label: How familiar are you with me on social media?

steps.title: Answer these with precision so we can design the right training for you
steps.helper: Share honestly. Your words help us understand your path with self-awareness and personal growth so we meet you on the right wavelength.

fields.label: Have you done personal development training before?
fields.placeholder: Name courses, teachers, or programs you’ve worked with

fields.label: Where do you sense yourself on your self-awareness journey?
options: Deep in it and unravelling patterns

steps.title: Help our office reach you smoothly
steps.helper: Let us know the best channel and timing so the team can follow up without delay.
